title: Don't treat ms-browser-extension:// as mixed content
body: If an extension wants to inject its own UI into an iframe on a https page, it should not be blocked with the error message "SEC7111: HTTPS security is compromised by ms-browser-extension://..."

comments.body: Any updates on this....we need that view all content icon to be removed....
Adding to recent comments - what is the fix / release ETA for this?  Do you confirm things with a status change to the "working on it" tag in the 22-March-2016 post?
Hello, could you tell us if this has been fixed? Or when it should be fixed? Thank you.
Yes this affects our project too.
